name: DANCE LIKE NO ONE IS LISTENING
name_original: DANCE LIKE NO ONE IS LISTENING
description:
DANCE LIKE NO ONE IS LISTENING

HAVE YOU EVER WANTED TO PLAY A DANCING GAME
(1) WITHOUT MUSIC AND
(2) WITHOUT DANCING?
NOW YOU CAN!


FEATURES:

MULTIPLE DANCE MOVES

FOUR DIFFICULTY LEVELS 

ENDLESS MODE

NUMERICAL RESULTS

UPPERCASE WORDS

COMPLETE SILENCE
